# Some code

```{r}
data(cgEx)
cgEx.cpm <- logCPM(cgEx)
cgEx.smooth <- boxSmoother(cgEx.cpm, h=5)
cgEx.bnbc <- bnbc(cgEx.smooth, colData(cgEx.smooth)$Batch, 1e7, 40000, nbands=10)
```
